ovdesc.p: When present this record is checked by the T24 core routines and any defined routines are run for the element of the system.

Routines are associated with HELPTEXT.MENU, ENQUIRY, VERSION, EB.COMPOSITE.SCREEN and EB.TABBED.SCREEN. T24 will pass across the record id and the actual record read from the system before presenting it to the user. The local routine can therefore change the record content dynamically and present a modified record to the user.
Note the modified record is not stored on the database, it is only present for that instance when used.
